40 class Range {
41  public:
42  typedef Range Range_;
43  typedef std::size_t size_type;
44  typedef std::vector<size_type> index;
45  typedef index index_type;
46  typedef detail::SizeArray<const size_type> size_array;
48  typedef size_array
49  extent_type;
50  typedef std::size_t
51  ordinal_type;
52  typedef detail::RangeIterator<size_type, Range_>
53  const_iterator;
54  friend class detail::RangeIterator<size_type, Range_>;
55 
56  protected:
57  size_type* data_ = nullptr;
66  size_type offset_ = 0ul;
67  size_type volume_ = 0ul;
68  unsigned int rank_ = 0u;
69 
70  private:
72 
81  template <typename Index1, typename Index2>
82  void init_range_data(const Index1& lower_bound, const Index2& upper_bound) {
83  // Construct temp pointers
84  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
85  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
86  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
87  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
88  using std::data;
89  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower_data = data(lower_bound);
90  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper_data = data(upper_bound);
91 
92  // Set the volume seed
93  volume_ = 1ul;
94  offset_ = 0ul;
95 
96  // Compute range data
97  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
98  // Check input dimensions
99  TA_ASSERT(lower_data[i] <= upper_data[i]);
100 
101  // Compute data for element i of lower, upper, and extent
102  const size_type lower_bound_i = lower_data[i];
103  const size_type upper_bound_i = upper_data[i];
104  const size_type extent_i = upper_bound_i - lower_bound_i;
105 
106  lower[i] = lower_bound_i;
107  upper[i] = upper_bound_i;
108  extent[i] = extent_i;
109  stride[i] = volume_;
110  offset_ += lower_bound_i * volume_;
111  volume_ *= extent_i;
112  }
113  }
114 
116 
124  template <typename Index,
125  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_pair<
126  typename Index::value_type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
127  void init_range_data(const Index& bound) {
128  // Construct temp pointers
129  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
130  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
131  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
132  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
133  using std::data;
134  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const bound_data = data(bound);
135 
136  // Set the volume seed
137  volume_ = 1ul;
138  offset_ = 0ul;
139 
140  // Compute range data
141  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
142  // Compute data for element i of lower, upper, and extent
143  const size_type lower_bound_i = bound_data[i].first;
144  const size_type upper_bound_i = bound_data[i].second;
145  const size_type extent_i = upper_bound_i - lower_bound_i;
146 
147  // Check input dimensions
148  TA_ASSERT(lower_bound_i >= 0ul);
149  TA_ASSERT(lower_bound_i <= upper_bound_i);
150 
151  lower[i] = lower_bound_i;
152  upper[i] = upper_bound_i;
153  extent[i] = extent_i;
154  stride[i] = volume_;
155  offset_ += lower_bound_i * volume_;
156  volume_ *= extent_i;
157  }
158  }
159 
161 
168  template <typename Index,
169  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_integral_list<
170  typename Index::value_type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
171  void init_range_data(const Index& extents) {
172  // Construct temp pointers
173  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
174  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
175  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
176  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
177  using std::data;
178  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent_data = data(extents);
179 
180  // Set the offset and volume initial values
181  volume_ = 1ul;
182  offset_ = 0ul;
183 
184  // Compute range data
185  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
186  // Check bounds of the input extent
187  TA_ASSERT(extent_data[i] >= 0);
188 
189  // Get extent i
190  const size_type extent_i = extent_data[i];
191 
192  lower[i] = 0ul;
193  upper[i] = extent_i;
194  extent[i] = extent_i;
195  stride[i] = volume_;
196  volume_ *= extent_i;
197  }
198  }
199 
201 
208  template <typename... Indices,
209  typename std::enable_if<
210  detail::is_integral_list<Indices...>::value>::type* = nullptr>
211  void init_range_data(const std::tuple<Indices...>& extents) {
212  const constexpr std::size_t rank =
213  std::tuple_size<std::tuple<Indices...>>::value;
214  TA_ASSERT(rank_ == rank);
215 
216  // Set the offset and volume initial values
217  volume_ = 1ul;
218  offset_ = 0ul;
219 
220  // initialize by recursion
221  init_range_data_helper(extents, std::make_index_sequence<rank>{});
222  }
223 
224  template <typename... Indices, std::size_t... Is>
225  void init_range_data_helper(const std::tuple<Indices...>& extents,
226  std::index_sequence<Is...>) {
227  int workers[] = {0, (init_range_data_helper_iter<Is>(extents), 0)...};
228  ++workers[0];
229  }
230 
231  template <std::size_t I, typename... Indices>
232  void init_range_data_helper_iter(const std::tuple<Indices...>& extents) {
233  // Check bounds of the input extent
234  TA_ASSERT(std::get<I>(extents) >= 0ul);
235 
236  // Get extent i
237  const size_type extent_i = std::get<I>(extents);
238 
239  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
240  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
241  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
242  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
243 
244  lower[I] = 0ul;
245  upper[I] = extent_i;
246  extent[I] = extent_i;
247  stride[I] = volume_;
248  volume_ *= extent_i;
249  }
250 
252 
260  void init_range_data(
261  const Permutation& perm,
262  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const other_lower_bound,
263  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const other_upper_bound) {
264  // Create temporary pointers to this range data
265  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
266  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
267  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const extent = upper + rank_;
268  auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = extent + rank_;
269 
270  // Copy the permuted lower, upper, and extent into this range.
271  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < rank_; ++i) {
272  const auto perm_i = perm[i];
273 
274  // Get the lower bound, upper bound, and extent from other for rank i.
275  const auto other_lower_bound_i = other_lower_bound[i];
276  const auto other_upper_bound_i = other_upper_bound[i];
277  const auto other_extent_i = other_upper_bound_i - other_lower_bound_i;
278 
279  // Store the permuted lower bound, upper bound, and extent
280  lower[perm_i] = other_lower_bound_i;
281  upper[perm_i] = other_upper_bound_i;
282  extent[perm_i] = other_extent_i;
283  }
284 
285  // Recompute stride, offset, and volume
286  volume_ = 1ul;
287  offset_ = 0ul;
288  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
289  const auto lower_i = lower[i];
290  const auto extent_i = extent[i];
291  stride[i] = volume_;
292  offset_ += lower_i * volume_;
293  volume_ *= extent_i;
294  }
295  }
296 
297  public:
299 
301  Range() {}
302 
304 
313  template <
314  typename Index1, typename Index2,
315  typename std::enable_if_t<!std::is_integral<Index1>::value &&
316  !std::is_integral<Index2>::value>* = nullptr>
317  Range(const Index1& lower_bound, const Index2& upper_bound) {
318  using std::size;
319  const size_type n = size(lower_bound);
320  TA_ASSERT(n == size(upper_bound));
321  if (n) {
322  // Initialize array memory
323  data_ = new size_type[n << 2];
324  rank_ = n;
325  init_range_data(lower_bound, upper_bound);
326  }
327  }
328

341  Range(const std::initializer_list<Index1>& lower_bound,
342  const std::initializer_list<Index1>& upper_bound) {
343  using std::size;
344  const size_type n = size(lower_bound);
345  TA_ASSERT(n == size(upper_bound));
346  if (n) {
347  // Initialize array memory
348  data_ = new size_type[n << 2];
349  rank_ = n;
350  init_range_data(lower_bound, upper_bound);
351  }
352  }

461  template <typename... IndexPairs,
462  std::enable_if_t<detail::is_integral_pair_list_v<IndexPairs...>>* =
463  nullptr>
464  explicit Range(const IndexPairs... bounds)
465  : Range(std::array<std::pair<std::size_t, std::size_t>,
466  sizeof...(IndexPairs)>{
467  {static_cast<std::pair<std::size_t, std::size_t>>(bounds)...}}) {}

470 
473  Range(const Range_& other) {
474  if (other.rank_ > 0ul) {
475  data_ = new size_type[other.rank_ << 2];
476  offset_ = other.offset_;
477  volume_ = other.volume_;
478  rank_ = other.rank_;
479  memcpy(data_, other.data_, (sizeof(size_type) << 2) * other.rank_);
480  }
481  }
482 
484 
487  Range(Range_&& other)
488  : data_(other.data_),
489  offset_(other.offset_),
490  volume_(other.volume_),
491  rank_(other.rank_) {
492  other.data_ = nullptr;
493  other.offset_ = 0ul;
494  other.volume_ = 0ul;
495  other.rank_ = 0u;
496  }
497 
499 
503  Range(const Permutation& perm, const Range_& other) {
504  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == other.rank_);
505 
506  if (other.rank_ > 0ul) {
507  data_ = new size_type[other.rank_ << 2];
508  rank_ = other.rank_;
509 
510  if (perm) {
511  init_range_data(perm, other.data_, other.data_ + rank_);
512  } else {
513  // Simple copy will do
514  memcpy(data_, other.data_, (sizeof(size_type) << 2) * rank_);
515  offset_ = other.offset_;
516  volume_ = other.volume_;
517  }
518  }
519  }
520 
522  ~Range() { delete[] data_; }
523 
525 
529  Range_& operator=(const Range_& other) {
530  if (rank_ != other.rank_) {
531  delete[] data_;
532  data_ = (other.rank_ > 0ul ? new size_type[other.rank_ << 2] : nullptr);
533  rank_ = other.rank_;
534  }
535  memcpy(data_, other.data_, (sizeof(size_type) << 2) * rank_);
536  offset_ = other.offset_;
537  volume_ = other.volume_;
538 
539  return *this;
540  }
541 
543 
547  Range_& operator=(Range_&& other) {
548  data_ = other.data_;
549  offset_ = other.offset_;
550  volume_ = other.volume_;
551  rank_ = other.rank_;
552 
553  other.data_ = nullptr;
554  other.offset_ = 0ul;
555  other.volume_ = 0ul;
556  other.rank_ = 0u;
557 
558  return *this;
559  }

565  unsigned int rank() const { return rank_; }

571  std::pair<size_type, size_type> dim(std::size_t d) const {
572  TA_ASSERT(d < rank());
573  return std::make_pair(lobound(d), upbound(d));
574  }

690  const_iterator begin() const {
691  return (volume_ > 0) ? const_iterator(data_, this) : end();
692  }

710  template <typename Index,
711  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value,
712  bool>::type* = nullptr>
713  bool includes(const Index& index) const {
714  using std::size;
715  TA_ASSERT(size(index) == rank_);
716  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
717  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = lower + rank_;
718 
719  bool result = (rank_ > 0u);
720  using std::cbegin;
721  auto it = cbegin(index);
722  for (unsigned int i = 0u; result && (i < rank_); ++i, ++it) {
723  const size_type index_i = *it;
724  const size_type lower_i = lower[i];
725  const size_type upper_i = upper[i];
726  result = result && (index_i >= lower_i) && (index_i < upper_i);
727  }
728 
729  return result;
730  }
731 
733 
741  template <typename Integer>
742  bool includes(const std::initializer_list<Integer>& index) const {
743  return includes<std::initializer_list<Integer>>(index);
744  }
745 
747 
751  template <typename Ordinal>
752  typename std::enable_if<std::is_integral<Ordinal>::value, bool>::type
753  includes(Ordinal i) const {
754  return include_ordinal_(i);
755  }
756 
757  template <typename... Index>
758  typename std::enable_if<(sizeof...(Index) > 1ul), size_type>::type includes(
759  const Index&... index) const {
760  const size_type i[sizeof...(Index)] = {static_cast<size_type>(index)...};
761  return includes(i);
762  }

765 
771  Range_& operator*=(const Permutation& perm);
772 
774 
783  template <typename Index>
784  Range_& resize(const Index& lower_bound, const Index& upper_bound) {
785  using std::size;
786  const size_type n = size(lower_bound);
787  TA_ASSERT(n == size(upper_bound));
788 
789  // Reallocate memory for range arrays
790  if (rank_ != n) {
791  delete[] data_;
792  data_ = (n > 0ul ? new size_type[n << 2] : nullptr);
793  rank_ = n;
794  }
795  if (n > 0ul)
796  init_range_data(lower_bound, upper_bound);
797  else
798  volume_ = 0ul;
799 
800  return *this;
801  }
802 
804 
808  template <typename Index>
809  Range_& inplace_shift(const Index& bound_shift) {
810  using std::size;
811  TA_ASSERT(size(bound_shift) == rank_);
812 
813  using std::data;
814  const auto* MADNESS_RESTRICT const bound_shift_data = data(bound_shift);
815  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
816  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = data_ + rank_;
817  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = upper + rank_ + rank_;
818 
819  offset_ = 0ul;
820  for (unsigned i = 0u; i < rank_; ++i) {
821  // Load range data
822  const auto bound_shift_i = bound_shift_data[i];
823  auto lower_i = lower[i];
824  auto upper_i = upper[i];
825  const auto stride_i = stride[i];
826 
827  // Compute new range bounds
828  lower_i += bound_shift_i;
829  upper_i += bound_shift_i;
830 
831  // Update range data
832  offset_ += lower_i * stride_i;
833  lower[i] = lower_i;
834  upper[i] = upper_i;
835  }
836 
837  return *this;
838  }
839 
841 
845  template <typename I>
846  Range_& inplace_shift(const std::initializer_list<I>& bound_shift) {
847  return inplace_shift<std::initializer_list<I>>(bound_shift);
848  }

851 
855  template <typename Index>
856  Range_ shift(const Index& bound_shift) {
857  Range_ result(*this);
858  result.inplace_shift(bound_shift);
859  return result;
860  }

869  ordinal_type ordinal(const ordinal_type index) const {
870  TA_ASSERT(includes(index));
871  return index;
872  }
873 
875 
881  template <
882  typename Index,
883  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value>::type* = nullptr>
884  ordinal_type ordinal(const Index& index) const {
885  using std::size;
886  TA_ASSERT(size(index) == rank_);
887  TA_ASSERT(includes(index));
888 
889  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const stride = data_ + rank_ + rank_ + rank_;
890 
891  size_type result = 0ul;
892  using std::cbegin;
893  auto index_it = cbegin(index);
894  for (unsigned int i = 0u; i < rank_; ++i, ++index_it) {
895  const size_type stride_i = stride[i];
896  result += *(index_it)*stride_i;
897  }
898 
899  return result - offset_;
900  }
901 
903 
909  template <typename... Index,
910  typename std::enable_if<(sizeof...(Index) > 1ul)>::type* = nullptr>
911  size_type ordinal(const Index&... index) const {
912  const size_type temp_index[sizeof...(Index)] = {
913  static_cast<size_type>(index)...};
914  return ordinal(temp_index);
915  }
916 
918 
924  index idx(size_type index) const {
925  // Check that index is contained by range.
926  // N.B. this will fail if any extent is zero
927  TA_ASSERT(includes(index));
928 
929  // Construct result coordinate index object and allocate its memory.
930  Range_::index result(rank_, 0);
931 
932  // Get pointers to the data
933  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result_data = result.data();
934  size_type const* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
935  size_type const* MADNESS_RESTRICT const size = data_ + rank_ + rank_;
936 
937  // Compute the coordinate index of index in range.
938  for (int i = int(rank_) - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
939  const size_type lower_i = lower[i];
940  const size_type size_i = size[i];
941 
942  // Compute result index element i
943  const size_type result_i = (index % size_i) + lower_i;
944  index /= size_i;
945 
946  // Store result
947  result_data[i] = result_i;
948  }
949 
950  return result;
951  }
952 
954 
959  template <
960  typename Index,
961  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_integral<Index>::value>::type* = nullptr>
962  const Index& idx(const Index& i) const {
963  TA_ASSERT(includes(i));
964  return i;
965  }
966 
967  template <typename Archive,
968  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_input_archive<
969  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
970  void serialize(const Archive& ar) {
971  // Get rank
972  unsigned int rank = 0ul;
973  ar& rank;
974 
975  // Reallocate the array
976  const unsigned int four_x_rank = rank << 2;
977  if (rank_ != rank) {
978  delete[] data_;
979  data_ = (rank > 0u ? new size_type[four_x_rank] : nullptr);
980  rank_ = rank;
981  }
982 
983  // Get range data
984  ar& madness::archive::wrap(data_, four_x_rank) & offset_& volume_;
985  }
986 
987  template <typename Archive,
988  typename std::enable_if<madness::archive::is_output_archive<
989  Archive>::value>::type* = nullptr>
990  void serialize(const Archive& ar) const {
991  ar& rank_& madness::archive::wrap(data_, rank_ << 2) & offset_& volume_;
992  }
993 
994  void swap(Range_& other) {
995  // Get temp data
996  std::swap(data_, other.data_);
997  std::swap(offset_, other.offset_);
998  std::swap(volume_, other.volume_);
999  std::swap(rank_, other.rank_);
1000  }
1001 
1002  private:
1004 
1009  template <typename Index>
1010  typename std::enable_if<std::is_signed<Index>::value, bool>::type
1011  include_ordinal_(Index i) const {
1012  return (i >= Index(0)) && (i < Index(volume_));
1013  }
1014 
1016 
1020  template <typename Index>
1021  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_signed<Index>::value, bool>::type
1022  include_ordinal_(Index i) const {
1023  return i < volume_;
1024  }
1025 
1027 
1032  void increment(index& i) const {
1033  TA_ASSERT(includes(i));
1034 
1035  size_type const* MADNESS_RESTRICT const lower = data_;
1036  size_type const* MADNESS_RESTRICT const upper = data_ + rank_;
1037 
1038  for (int d = int(rank_) - 1; d >= 0; --d) {
1039  // increment coordinate
1040  ++i[d];
1041 
1042  // break if done
1043  if (i[d] < upper[d]) return;
1044 
1045  // Reset current index to lower bound.
1046  i[d] = lower[d];
1047  }
1048 
1049  // if the current location was set to lower then it was at the end and
1050  // needs to be reset to equal upper.
1051  std::copy(upper, upper + rank_, i.begin());
1052  }
1053 
1055 
1061  void advance(index& i, std::ptrdiff_t n) const {
1062  TA_ASSERT(includes(i));
1063  const size_type o = ordinal(i) + n;
1064  TA_ASSERT(includes(o));
1065  i = idx(o);
1066  }
1067 
1069 
1077  std::ptrdiff_t distance_to(const index& first, const index& last) const {
1078  TA_ASSERT(includes(first));
1079  TA_ASSERT(includes(last));
1080  return ordinal(last) - ordinal(first);
1081  }
1082 
1083 }; // class Range
1084 
1085 inline Range& Range::operator*=(const Permutation& perm) {
1086  TA_ASSERT(perm.dim() == rank_);
1087  if (rank_ > 1ul) {
1088  // Copy the lower and upper bound data into a temporary array
1089  size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const temp_lower = new size_type[rank_ << 1];
1090  const size_type* MADNESS_RESTRICT const temp_upper = temp_lower + rank_;
1091  std::memcpy(temp_lower, data_, (sizeof(size_type) << 1) * rank_);
1092 
1093  init_range_data(perm, temp_lower, temp_upper);
1094 
1095  // Cleanup old memory.
1096  delete[] temp_lower;
1097  }
1098  return *this;
1099 }
1100 
1102 inline void swap(Range& r0, Range& r1) { // no throw
1103  r0.swap(r1);
1104 }
1105 
1107 
1111 inline Range operator*(const Permutation& perm, const Range& r) {
1112  return Range(perm, r);
1113 }
1114 
1116 
1121 inline bool operator==(const Range& r1, const Range& r2) {
1122  return (r1.rank() == r2.rank()) &&
1123  !std::memcmp(r1.lobound_data(), r2.lobound_data(),
1124  r1.rank() * (2u * sizeof(Range::size_type)));
1125 }
1127 
1132 inline bool operator!=(const Range& r1, const Range& r2) {
1133  return (r1.rank() != r2.rank()) ||
1134  std::memcmp(r1.lobound_data(), r2.lobound_data(),
1135  r1.rank() * (2u * sizeof(Range::size_type)));
1136 }
1137 
1139 
1143 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Range& r) {
1144  os << "[ ";
1145  detail::print_array(os, r.lobound_data(), r.rank());
1146  os << ", ";
1147  detail::print_array(os, r.upbound_data(), r.rank());
1148  os << " )";
1149  return os;
1150 }
1151 
1153 
1158 inline bool is_congruent(const Range& r1, const Range& r2) {
1159  return (r1.rank() == r2.rank()) &&
1160  std::equal(r1.extent_data(), r1.extent_data() + r1.rank(),
1161  r2.extent_data());
1162 }
1163 
1164 } // namespace TiledArray
